summary: Invisible atomic monsters attack a U.S. Armed Forces base and the local residents.
cast: Marshall Thompson|Kynaston Reeves|Kim Parker|Stanley Maxted|Terry Kilburn|James Dyrenforth|Robert MacKenzie|Peter Madden|Gil Winfield|Michael Balfour|Launce Maraschal|Meadows White|E. Kerrigan Prescott|Lala Lloyd|Shane Cordell|Sheldon Allan|Alexander Archdale|Victor Harrington|Jack Hetherington|Richard Neller|Tom Watson
title: Monstruo sin rostro
